citeinfo.origin: Alaska Department of Natural Resources (DNR), Geological and Geophysical Surveys Division, Resource Analysis Section
citeinfo.title: Southcentral - Regional Database

descript.abstract: Data Type: Multi-Resources; The datasets included in this database were compiled as part of the Alaska Land and Resource Mapping Program (ALARM). This program involved the systematic preparation, mapping, and automation of natural resource data in a standardized approach for data classification and resolution. ESRI of Redlands California was involved in the automation of the datasets in this database. Database compiled at 1:250,000 scale. Intended to support State of Alaska, Dept. of Natural Resources, management decision making processes.

theme.themekey: Alaska Land and Resource Mapping Program (ALARM)

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
